DOC.brief_summary: Purpose : To evaluate efficiency Irritable Bowel Syndrome ( IBS ) patient treatment H1-receptor antagonist ebastine . Design : Double blind randomized placebo control trial . IBS patient receive 12-weeks treatment ebastine 20mg daily placebo ( 1:1 randomization ) .
